Bootcamps.Bootcamp05.edu.monash.fit2099.clients

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bootcamps.Bootcamp05.edu.monash.fit2099.clients.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    The Client class handles the creation, characteristics and behaviour of all clients which participate in the car auction. This is version 5 of this class, as it is from Week 5's Bootcamp.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Client getInstance(java.lang.String firstName,
                                 java.lang.String lastName)
        Public static factory method for other classes to create instances of the client class.
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name of the client.
        lastName - the last name of the client.
        Returns:
        a client instance if the first name and last name are of correct format, otherwise null.

      • setClientId

        public void setClientId(int clientId)
        Setter for client Id number.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The id number of the client.

      • setFirstName

        public boolean setFirstName(java.lang.String firstName)
        Setter for the first name of the client.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The first name of the client, an alphabetic word of length 2 to 15.
        Returns:
        a boolean verifier, where true for setting of correct format first name, and false otherwise.

      • setLastName

        public boolean setLastName(java.lang.String lastName)
        Setter for the last name of the client.
        Parameters:
        lastName - The last name of the client, an alphabetic word of length 2 to 15.
        Returns:
        a boolean verifier, where true for setting of correct format last name, and false otherwise.

      • getClientId

        public int getClientId()
        Getter for client Id number.
        Returns:
        the client's Id number.

      • getFirstName

        public java.lang.String getFirstName()
        Getter for client's first name.
        Returns:
        the client's first name.

      • getLastName

        public java.lang.String getLastName()
        Getter for client's last name.
        Returns:
        the client's last name.

      • description

        public java.lang.String description()
        String method to print out the description of the client.
        Returns:
        A string containing the client's Id, first name, and last name.
